attributes.text:
EXPERIMENTAL – NOT READY FOR PRODUCTION

Touch event object.

For more information see: http://developer.apple.com/safari/library/documentation/UserExperience/Reference/TouchEventClassReference/TouchEvent/TouchEvent.html
{Integer ? 0) The index of the Touch object to retrieve
Returns an event specific touch on the target element. This function is used as the “touchend” event only offers Touch objects in the changedTouches array.
A native Touch object
Returns the event specific touches on the target element. This function is used as the “touchend” event only offers Touch objects in the changedTouches array.
Array of native Touch objects
Returns an array of native Touch objects representing all current touches on the document. Returns an empty array for the “touchend” event.
Array of touch objects. For more information see: http://developer.apple.com/safari/library/documentation/UserExperience/Reference/TouchClassReference/Touch/Touch.html

Returns an array of native Touch objects representing all touches of the target element that changed in this event.

On the “touchstart” event the array contains all touches that were added to the target element. On the “touchmove” event the array contains all touches that were moved on the target element. On the “touchend” event the array contains all touches that used to be on the target element.
Array of touch objects. For more information see: http://developer.apple.com/safari/library/documentation/UserExperience/Reference/TouchClassReference/Touch/Touch.html
{Integer ? 0) The index of the Touch object
Get the horizontal position at which the event occurred relative to the left of the document. This property takes into account any scrolling of the page.
The horizontal position of the touch in the document.
{Integer ? 0) The index of the Touch object
Get the vertical position at which the event occurred relative to the top of the document. This property takes into account any scrolling of the page.
The vertical position of the touch in the document.
{Integer ? 0) The index of the Touch object
Returns the unique identifier for a certain touch object.
Unique identifier of the touch object
iOS only: Returns the delta of the rotation since the start of the event, in degrees. Initial value is 0.0 Clockwise > 0 Counter-clockwise < 0.
The rotation delta

iOS only: Returns the distance between two fingers since the start of the event. The distance is a multiplier of the initial distance. Initial value: 1.0. Gestures: < 1.0, pinch close / zoom out. > 1.0, pinch open / to zoom in.
The scale distance between two fingers
{Integer ? 0) The index of the Touch object
Get the horizontal coordinate at which the event occurred relative to the origin of the screen coordinate system.
The horizontal position of the touch
{Integer ? 0) The index of the Touch object
Get the vertical coordinate at which the event occurred relative to the origin of the screen coordinate system.
The vertical position of the touch
Returns an array of native Touch objects representing all touches associated with the event target element. Returns an empty array for the “touchend” event.
Array of touch objects. For more information see: http://developer.apple.com/safari/library/documentation/UserExperience/Reference/TouchClassReference/Touch/Touch.html
{Integer ? 0) The index of the Touch object
Get the the horizontal coordinate at which the event occurred relative to the viewport.
The horizontal position of the touch
{Integer ? 0) The index of the Touch object
Get the vertical coordinate at which the event occurred relative to the viewport.
The vertical position of the touch
Checks whether more than one touch is associated with the event target element.
Is multi-touch
